## Resources.ICandidateDeclOptions interface

Options for creating a [ResourceCandidate](./ts-res.resources.resourcecandidate.md) declaration.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface ICandidateDeclOptions extends ResourceJson.Helpers.IDeclarationOptions 
```
**Extends:** ResourceJson.Helpers.IDeclarationOptions

## Remarks

This interface extends the [declaration options](./ts-res.resourcejson.helpers.ideclarationoptions.md) interface to include a `reduceQualifiers` option.
